    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public static void apply(Fst fst,
         java.util.Comparator<Arc> cmp)
        Applies the ArcSort on the provided fst. Sorting can be applied either on input or output label based on the provided comparator. ArcSort can be applied to both Fst and ImmutableFst
        Parameters:
        fst - the fst to sort it's arcs
        cmp - the provided Comparator
